ingredients.ingredient: 4 cups torn romaine lettuce, or more to taste
1 avocado - peeled, pitted and chopped - or more to taste
1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, or more to taste
1 (15 ounce) can ranch-style beans, rinsed and drained
2 cups corn chips (such as Fritos®, crushed - or more to taste
¼ cup Catalina salad dressing, or to taste

cookingTips: Add the avocado and corn chips just before serving to prevent browning and sogginess
Toast the corn chips lightly for extra crunch
Use fresh lime juice as a boost to the Catalina dressing
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me build a fresh Mexican salad with the right texture contrast and flavors.
